mapper.sql: ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, ISSEND, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, SFCNUMBER, ARCHIVETYPE, ARCHIVENAME,CASEINFOID,BASERECORDID,ISSUSPECTORDER
mapper.insert: insert into FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC (ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, ISSEND, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, SFCNUMBER, ARCHIVETYPE, ARCHIVENAME,BASERECORDID,ISSUSPECTORDER ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issend,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfcnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{archivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{caseinfoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{baserecordid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{issuspectorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

select SEQ_FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC_ID.nextval from dual

ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, caseinfoid, BASERECORDID, ISSUSPECTORDER,

mapper.update:
update FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC
SCBJ = #{scbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATETIME = sysdate,
JQBH = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AJBH = #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSEND = #{issend,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHORIDCARD = #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFCNUMBER = #{sfcnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARCHIVETYPE = #{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARCHIVENAME = #{archivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUSPECTORDER = #{issuspectorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select count(0) from FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC where 1=1 and scbj=0 and CASEINFOID = #{caseinfoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC WHERE SCBJ=0 AND CASEINFOID=#{caseinfoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND ARCHIVETYPE=0
